name: Removable Drive Menu
description: Add a status menu for accessing and unmounting removable devices.

name: AppIndicator Support
description: Enables support for AppIndicator, KStatusNotifierItem, and legacy Tray icons in the Shell.

name: NoAnnoyance v2
description: Eliminates the 'Windows is ready' notification and brings the window into focus.

name: Pano - Clipboard Manager
description: Cutting-edge clipboard manager for GNOME Shell.

name: Clipboard Indicator
description: Adds clipboard indicator to top panel, caches history.

name: Bluetooth Battery Meter
description: Adds a battery meter to the Bluetooth icon.
